alert.note: Alert for Okanogan Valley (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 18 at 2:32AM PST until December 18 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...SNOW TODAY THROUGH THE WEEKEND FOR THE INLAND NORTHWEST... .A winter storm will continue over the Inland Northwest Saturday and Sunday. Snow will become heavy over the Cascades Saturday morning through Saturday night. Travel will be difficult over Stevens Pass with this winter storm. Snow is expected to decrease by late Sunday morning over the Cascades and northern Washington and Idaho. Snow will pick up over the Washington and Idaho Palouse and the Washington Blues Saturday night through Sunday night. Heavy snow will persist in the Idaho Panhandle mountains into early next week. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 1 and 4 inches. * WHERE...Disautel Pass, Brewster, Omak, Bridgeport, Nespelem, Oroville, and Okanogan. * WHEN...Until 10 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions are expected Saturday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
